A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Intentionally stayed away from all reviews and leaks\, I wanted to come in as blind to the film as could be possible. I ended up loving it. It wasn't just a great SW film but a great film itself. Some seem to be upset that there wasn't just two and a half hours of fan service and catering to the millions of fan theories that were baked up after The Force Awakens.
